name: 陳貞光
objective: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-component and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.
schedule:
week 1-4: Chap. 2-4, 6 Review for First, Second, Third Law of Thermodynamics
week 5-7: Chap. 5 Auxiliary functions , Chap. 7 Phase equilibrium
week 9: Midterm exam
week 10-11: Chap. 8/9 Gas behavior/ Solutions
week 12-14: Chap. 10/15 Phase diagram, phase transformation/ spinodal decomposition, nucleation and growth
week 15-17: Chap. 11-13 Reactions, defect reactions
week 18: Final exams
scorePolicy:
40% assignment and class performance
30% midterm exam
30% final exam
materials:
D.R.Gaskell and D.E.Laughlin, Introduction to the Thermodynamics of Materials, 6th Ed., CRC Press, 2018.
中文參考書：材料熱力學，陳貞光編譯，偉明圖書，c.2020 (原著：同英文教科書，by David R. Gaskell and D.E.Laughlin, 6th Ed., 2018)
D.A.Porter and K.E.Easterling, Phase Transformation in Metals and Alloys, 2nd Ed., CRC Press, 2001.
J.W.Christian, The Theory of Transformations in Metals and Alloys, 2nd Ed., Pergamon Press, 1981.
